step_feedback.feedback: Good start! Keep your shoulders relaxed and focus on maintaining a comfortable posture.
Try to keep your elbows closer to your body and focus on extending your arms overhead. Your wrists are a bit too far from the target.
Excellent work squeezing your shoulder blades together! Focus on keeping your elbows slightly bent as you push down.
Great job relaxing and stretching your arms overhead. Ensure a full exhale as you return to the starting position.
You're doing well! Continue to focus on smooth transitions between movements and maintaining good form throughout.
Second rep is looking good! Remember to keep your shoulders down and relaxed as you begin.
Your elbows are much closer this time, which is great! Keep that focus as you extend your arms.
Fantastic control as you push down and squeeze your shoulder blades. Your elbows are in a good position.
Well done returning to the overhead stretch. Remember to breathe out fully as you relax.
Great finish to the second set! You're showing good consistency in your movements and form.

exercise_summary: You did a great job with the Push Down Pumping exercise! Focus on keeping your elbows closer to your body during the push-down phase and ensure a full exhale as you stretch your arms overhead. Keep up the excellent work!
